snippet: News of a partnership between IBM and Apple, and an offer from 21st Century Fox to take over Time Warner, boosted markets to another high.
abstract: Stock market rises and Dow Jones industrial average closes at new benchmark high as investors are encouraged by latest merger news and strong corporate earnings.
lead_paragraph: News of a partnership between IBM and Apple, and an offer from 21st Century Fox to take over Time Warner, boosted markets to another high.

headline.main: Merger Possibilities and Earnings Inspire the Market
headline.print_headline: Merger Possibilities and Earnings Inspire the Market
